Text: Hi BBS, Im wondering if you have Ecology 2nd by Michael Cain and Evolution by Bergstrom? If you have it that will be awesome! :D thank you for all the books you offer for the people! :)

I just DL'd your epub #6 with tim lahaye "left behind" series. Its not pulling up as a ePub on any of my readers. I use google books, Aldiko and Cook reader. Could you please redo those and upload them again. I have been looking all over for those books on ePub and you are the closest i come to getting them. Thank you so much for your hard work and sacrifice to please your fans.....

@romeo2539

Those files were labeled incorrectly they are actually txt.files.

I do have them in ePUB but I'm not sure I have the entire series,I will see if I can get the entire series and upload them in my next flood

Sorry for any inconvenience

Thanks,BBS! This book is much better than Thurman's! Nice introduction for everyone, including students from other disciplines.I was wondering if you are interested in oceans.I see 'SEA' in your TPB name! keep it up!

@CrowZero

Your welcome :)

Yes I'm very interested in Oceans,I live on an Island

Also I responded to your PM on "surprbay" a while back about some books you wanted,you never got back to me
Hello, could you please upload "Oceanography: An Invitation to Marine Science" by Garrison? Thank you for this book by the way!
